sqlMap.select: /* userMenu.totalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM MENU WHERE DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# AND PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType#
/* userMenu.exist */ SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM MENU WHERE DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# AND PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND PAGE_ID=#pageId#

/* userMenu.findQuick4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE b.IS_QUICK_MENU=1 AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId:INTEGER# ) ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findQuick4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE b.IS_QUICK_MENU=1 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findQuick */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM MENU a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=1 AND b.IS_QUICK_MENU=1 a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY a.MENU_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findAll4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/user%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/group%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) ORDER BY b.DEPTH,b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findAll4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/user%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/group%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) ORDER BY b.DEPTH,b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findAll */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, CAST( #langKnd# AS VARCHAR(2)) LANG_KND FROM MENU a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=#menuType# a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/user%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/group%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.DEPTH,a.MENU_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findAll2 */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM ( SELECT PAGE_ID, PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER FROM PAGE WHERE PATH IN #pathList[]# ) a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID WHERE (b.DOMAIN_ID=0 b.DOMAIN_ID=#domainId# ) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/user%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/group%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.DEPTH,a.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findById4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PARENT_ID=#pageId# AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findById4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PARENT_ID=#pageId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findById */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM MENU a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND a.PARENT_ID=#pageId# a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY a.MENU_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findByPath4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PAGE_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PATH=#path#) AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findByPath4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PAGE_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PATH=#path#) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findByPath */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM MENU a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND a.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PAGE_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PATH=#path#) a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY a.MENU_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findByUser */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE='ko') AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE='ko') AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE b.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PAGE_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PATH='/user/'||#userId#) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.findByGroup */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE b.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PAGE_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PATH='/group/'||#groupId#) AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%' ORDER BY b.SORT_ORDER ASC

/* userMenu.detail4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PAGE_ID=#pageId# AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'

/* userMenu.detail4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PAGE_ID=#pageId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'

/* userMenu.detail */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND a.PAGE_ID=#pageId# a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'

/* userMenu.detailByPath4Guest */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PATH=#path# AND IS_PROTECTED=0 AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'

/* userMenu.detailByPath4Admin */ SELECT b.PAGE_ID,b.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM PAGE b WHERE 1=1 AND b.PATH=#path# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'

/* userMenu.detailByPath */ SELECT a.PAGE_ID,a.PARENT_ID,b.NAME,b.URL,b.PATH,b.DOMAIN_ID, b.TYPE DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT PATH FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME) DEFAULT_PAGE_PATH, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS TITLE, (SELECT VALUE FROM PAGE_METADATA WHERE PAGE_ID=a.PAGE_ID AND NAME='short-title' AND LOCALE=#langKnd#) AS SHORT_TITLE, b.TARGET,b.SKIN,b.IS_HIDDEN,b.IS_QUICK_MENU,b.PARAMETER,b.DEFAULT_PAGE_NAME,b.PAGE_INFO01,b.PAGE_INFO02,b.PAGE_INFO03, #langKnd# LANG_KND FROM MENU a INNER JOIN PAGE b ON a.PAGE_ID=b.PAGE_ID AND a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND a.MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND b.PATH=#path# a.groupId=#ChangeGroupId# AND PATH NOT LIKE '/cafe%' AND PATH NOT LIKE '/blog%'
sqlMap.insert: /* userMenu.insertByPath */ INSERT INTO MENU ( PRINCIPAL_ID,GROUP_ID,PAGE_ID,PARENT_ID, DOMAIN_ID, MENU_TYPE, MENU_ORDER ) (SELECT CAST(#principal_id# AS DECIMAL), CAST( #group_principal_id# AS DECIMAL), PAGE_ID, PARENT_ID, CAST( #domainId# AS DECIMAL), 0, SORT_ORDER FROM PAGE WHERE PATH=#pagePath#)
sqlMap.update: /* userMenu.update */ UPDATE MENU SET MENU_ORDER=#menuOrder# WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND PAGE_ID=#pageId# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND DOMAIN_ID=#domainId#
/* userMenu.updateMyPageOrder */ UPDATE PAGE SET SORT_ORDER=#menuOrder# WHERE PAGE_ID=#pageId#
sqlMap.delete: /* userMenu.delete */ DELETE FROM MENU WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND PAGE_ID=#pageId# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND DOMAIN_ID=#domainId#
/* userMenu.deleteAll */ DELETE FROM MENU WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND DOMAIN_ID=#domainId#
/* userMenu.deleteByGroup */ DELETE FROM MENU WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principal_id# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType# AND GROUP_ID=#group_principal_id# AND DOMAIN_ID=#domainId#
sqlMap.select: /* userMenu.domainIdByPageId */ SELECT DOMAIN_ID FROM PAGE WHERE PAGE_ID=#pageId#
sqlMap.delete: /* userMenu.deleteMyMenuAll */ DELETE FROM MENU WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId# AND MENU_TYPE=#menuType#
